titles.title: To inform the Senate that a quorum of the House has assembled and of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.
To inform the Senate that a quorum of the House has assembled and of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Informs the Senate that J. Dennis Hastert has been elected Speaker of the House and that Jeffrey J. Trandahl has been elected Clerk.
